meanings.sent1: The fulvid sunset painted the sky in a soft glow.
meanings.sent2: Her dress was a fulvid shade that matched the autumn leaves.
meanings.sent3: The fulvid paint on the walls made the room feel cozy and warm.
meanings.sent4: The fulvid light of dawn slowly filled the room with a gentle brightness.
meanings.sent5: The fulvid flowers in the garden added a touch of warmth to the landscape.

meanings.sent1: The artist mixed red and yellow to create a beautiful fulvid.
meanings.sent2: The fulvid of the old book's pages showed its age.
meanings.sent3: The fulvid of the banana peel made it look unappetizing.
meanings.sent4: The fulvid of the streetlights cast a warm glow on the pavement.
meanings.sent5: The fulvid of the school bus stood out among the other vehicles.
